titleStmt.title: Act concerning husbands to be lyable for their wives fines, for withdrawing from the ordinances. Edinburgh, May 6. 1685.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
